DataElement.preferredName: Normal Tissue Segment Excision Collection Date and Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date or date and time the normal adjacent tissue was surgically removed from an organ.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Normal Tissue Segment Excision Collection Date Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into one to three aliquots of non-neoplastic ("normal") adjacent tissue (as feasible) suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis._The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ._The date or date and time of the specimen or data collection.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into one to three aliquots of non-neoplastic ("normal") adjacent tissue (as feasible) suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Concepts.definition: Tissue sample with cellular composition and architectural patterns expected for the particular anatomic site in which it belongs. There is no evidence of abnormal cellular infiltrates or tumor mass formation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ.:The date or date and time of the specimen or data collection.

Concepts.definition: The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.
The date or date and time of the specimen or data collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/27/21 jk Released per SME (NGM) review and approval.  9/23/20 jk created CPTAC Solid tumor procurement CRF.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date or date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2020-11-12 ak Released per SME approval email. 9/01/20 jk created for CPTAC Procurement question.  Per SME stored format is "DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM".

DataElement.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElement.changeDescription: 1/27/21 jk Released, upd Reg Status per SME (NGM) review and approval. 12/14/20 jk removed Normal tissue procurement CSI; new CDE created per SME review.  10/30/20 jk added Normal Tissue CSI. 9/29/20 jk created CPTAC Solid tumor procurement CRF.
